title: IISER Kolkata Recruitment 2025 - Walk -in-Interview for Project Assistant Post
description: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER Kolkata) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, Post Graduation, M.V.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the IISER Kolkata Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates...
